room_title: Escape room "Amazing Adventure Society: The Forgotten Room" by The Other Tales - Escape Rooms in New York
review: There were 8 of us which included my 5 grandchildren ages 9-13. They were awesome! Had such a good time. According to Alona, we did great for being first timers! Solved the mystery with 30 seconds to spare! Would highly recommend. Everyone had some type of valuable input. A real team effort!

room_title: Escape room "Amazing Adventure Society: The Forgotten Room" by The Other Tales - Escape Rooms in New York
review: The Other Tales was a fantastic place to have a good time with friends. The puzzles were really clever and fun to solve each one. I'd highly recommend it to anyone and encourage you all to give it a try!

room_title: Escape room "Amazing Adventure Society: The Forgotten Room" by The Other Tales - Escape Rooms in New York
review: Recently went with a bunch of my friends! We all had a blast and finished with 20 seconds left to spare. Its was very well planned and Alex was great! Definitely recommend! Can't wait for the next room!
